root.name: J-Stars Victory Vs
root.description: J-Stars Victory VS is a multi-player fighting game starring various popular stars of the Shonen Jump manga magazine. Graphically and overall aesthetically, it resembles the arcade title Dragon Ball Zenkai Battle Royal. J-Stars Victory VS is a celebratory title, created for the 45th anniversary of Shonen Jump.The game's initial reveal showed that Goku (Dragon Ball), Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece), and Toriko (Toriko) were playable. This is the first time that Toriko has been included in a crossover game. A blurry image in one of the screenshots seemed to indicate that Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto) was included, and he was confirmed on March 27, 2013.June 5, 2013 saw confirmation of Kenshin Himura (Rurouni Kenshin) and Ichigo Kurosaki (Bleach).
